page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I woke up and went downstairs into the lounge, sat down and watched Breakfast Television. Then my dad had to go to work at Hall Ropner. I said goodbye and he went to catch his train, my mum came in, then I asked for my breakfast. I had Frosties and then watched more television. After, I went and got washed and dressed. I put on a blue and white blouse and a blue and white skirt. Then I went to school in a black Ambassador car and crossed the road. Then we went in and had the register and went into assembly. Then we did maths, and soon it was lunch- time. I had a packed lunch. We then went swimming until home time. When I got home I went down riding, came home again, had my tea, got undressed and went to bed.
